Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/Maxwell
ShortDescription: Southbound 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Roosevelt, Racine, 18th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/Maxwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Roosevelt, Racine, 18th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/Maxwell.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed a Forest Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Forest Park. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Forest Park. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Midway and Pulaski
ShortDescription: Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Midway and Pulaski due to a stalled train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Midway and Pulaski due to a stalled train.

As a result, trains are operating only between the Loop and Pulaski at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Midway and Pulaski to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red, Yellow and Purple Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Red, Yellow and Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red, Yellow and Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
